name: ASU Dataverse
description: ASU Dataverse is a research data repository at Arizona State University, available to ASU-affiliated researchers and research projects. It supports uploading and sharing research data, supplementary tables, documentation, publications, and presentations. The repository accommodates any file type, including shapefiles, images, Flexible Image Transport System files, and compressed files. Special upload processes are used for very large datasets, and metadata enrichment is encouraged for FAIR publishing and long-term preservation.
